Falstad.name: Hammerang
Falstad.description: Throw out a Hammer that returns to Falstad, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies hit by 25% for 2 seconds. Reactive to explode the Hammer, dealing 95 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

Falstad.name: Lightning Rod
Falstad.description: Deal 107 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy, and an additional 75 (+4% per level) damage per second for 4 seconds while close to the target. Deals 100% increased damage to Minions and Mercenaries.

Falstad.name: Barrel Roll
Falstad.description: Dashes forward and grants a 171 (+4% per level) point Shield for 3 seconds.

Falstad.name: Mighty Gust
Falstad.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

Falstad.name: Hinterland Blast
Falstad.description: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

Falstad.name: Tailwind
Falstad.description: Gain 15% increased Movement Speed after not taking damage for 6 seconds.

Falstad.name: Flight
Falstad.description: Instead of mounting, Falstad can fly a great distance over terrain.

1.name: Gathering Storm
1.description: Quest: Every time Hammerang hits a Hero increase its damage by 0.2% and refund 6 Mana.

1.name: Dishonorable Discharge
1.description: Reduce Lightning Rod's cooldown by 3 seconds, and Takedowns reset its cooldown.  Quest: After 3 Lightning Rod strikes, subsequent strikes on enemy Heroes increases its damage by 1%, up to 75%.

1.name: Frequent Flyer
1.description: Activate Frequent Flyer to gain 40% Attack Speed and Tailwind for 5 seconds.  Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 0.5 Basic Attack Damage.

4.name: Static Shield
4.description: Lightning Rod strikes grant a Shield equal to 4% of Falstad's maximum Health, up to 28%, for 4 seconds.

4.name: Updraft
4.description: Increases Barrel Roll's range by 40% and Shield amount by 70%, and its Shield now lasts indefinitely.

4.name: Hammer Gains
4.description: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

7.name: Secret Weapon
7.description: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 90% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

7.name: BOOMerang
7.description: Hammerang's explosion deals 75% additional damage, and hitting enemy Heroes reduces their Spell Armor by 15 for 3 seconds.

7.name: Charged Up
7.description: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 25%.

10.name: Hinterland Blast
10.description: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

10.name: Mighty Gust
10.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

13.name: Thunderstrikes
13.description: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike.

13.name: Flow Rider
13.description: While Tailwind is active, Falstad's Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

13.name: Sustained Winds
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health, increased to 2% while Tailwind is active.

16.name: Crippling Hammer
16.description: Increase Hammerang's Slow from 25% to 50%, and Hammerang's explosion also Slows.

16.name: Aerie Gusts
16.description: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 6 to 3 seconds, and increases the Movement Speed bonus from 15% to 25%.

16.name: Afterburner
16.description: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

20.name: Call of the Wildhammer
20.description: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

20.name: Wind Tunnel
20.description: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

20.name: Nexus Frenzy
20.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

20.name: Epic Mount
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Flight by 50 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.
